Mr. Speaker, I rise today in support of Representative Kean's  Undersea Cable Control Act.

Over 99 percent of the world's data that crosses the oceans travels  through the fiber-optic cables that sit on the sea floor. This bill  requires the U.S. to develop and execute a strategy to protect this  critical infrastructure.
